name: @ai-s-tools/git-air
description: Advanced Git automation tool with recursive repository discovery and AI-powered commit messages for monorepos

scripts.pkg:build: npm run build && npm run pkg:linux && npm run pkg:macos && npm run pkg:windows
scripts.pkg:linux: npm run build && pkg dist/git-air.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output binaries/git_air-linux
scripts.pkg:macos: npm run build && pkg dist/git-air.js --targets node18-macos-x64 --output binaries/git_air-macos
scripts.pkg:windows: npm run build && pkg dist/git-air.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output binaries/git_air.exe

author: AI-S-Tools
